main event: A bright light object was observed on Grand Bahama Island, West Indies, which maneuvered, stopped, and then took off at a high speed.
interesting points: The object was elliptical in shape, about 3-4 times the size of a star, and pale white in color.
The object converged on the observer's position, stopped about 3 miles off, and remained stationary for about 2 minutes.
The object then took off at a very high rate of speed, disappearing from view in about 15 seconds.
No sound or trail was observed.
The sighting is consistent with other UFO reports, but insufficient data is available for evaluation or conclusions.
